{% extends "base.html" %} {% block content %} Welcome to the 2013 Rose-Hulman Undergraduate Conference on Mathematics. This is our 30th consecutive conference, and we look forward to hosting you as you visit the beautiful Rose-Hulman campus.

Some notes:

  • Conference dates: April 19 - 20, 2013
  • No registration fee and accommodations provided at the conference hotel for the first 40 registered undergraduates
  • Plenary Themes:
    • Computational Mathematics
    • Mathematical Biology
  • Panel discussions:
    • Industrial Careers in Mathematics
    • What to Expect from and How to Apply to Graduate School
  • The Best Presentation Competition will have a $100 award. Submission must be received by 4/1/2013. See the instructions
    • for further details.

We are hugely thankful to our sponsors, who have graciously provided funds to enhance the conference. Metron, MIT Lincoln Labs, and Sandia will participate in our panel on careers.
